column4: If I where to Formatted/Wiped Partion 1 (C:\), then place all of Ubuntu's Live ISO cds Files into Partition 1 (c:\), and edited my Windows boot.ini to include Partiton 1 (c:\), would it be able to boot to the live cd from my partiton 1, (Windows is on Partition 2 (D:\)?
hmm, will someone answer my question?
Is it possible to mount the image such as in Windows and Boot to it?
